text:
"It was the weirdest, craziest feeling I've ever felt."

A Texas man was watching a storm roll in when a bolt of lightning struck a 50-foot pine tree in his front yard – just feet from where he was sitting. https://t.co/BsLnHOVnb3 https://t.co/JTs6Vpt1L7

text: Five people are dead, including two children, after an early morning house fire that police and fire officials say appears to be arson. https://t.co/ojeavy63iq

name: ABC
text:
ON THE PROWL: Police in Chile spotted another cougar wandering the streets of Santiago as millions of the city's residents remain on lockdown.

The Chilean capital is at the foot of the Andes mountains, a natural habitat for the big cats. https://t.co/441Y7zQB4E https://t.co/EaDfiMbkPS
